data.title: Richard Gere: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Richard Gere: Check out the list of all Richard Gere movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Richard Gere news on Times of India.
data.text:
Richard Gere joins showtime's "The Agency"

etimes.in / Jul 04, 2024, 13:56 (IST)

Chris McCarthy, the Co-CEO of Paramount Global and President/CEO of Showtime & MTV Entertainment Studios, praised Gere, saying, "Richard Gere is in a class of his own, adored by generations of fans worldwide for his exceptional ability to infuse depth and authenticity into every role he plays. We are delighted to have him join our extraordinary cast which includes Michael Fassbender and Jeffrey Wright in Showtime's latest thriller."

Kiara Advani is all smiles as she strikes a pose with Richard Gere at Women in Cinema Gala Dinner at Cannes 2024 - See inside

etimes.in / May 19, 2024, 19:55 (IST)

Kiara Advani recently graced the Red Sea Film Foundation's Women in Cinema Gala Dinner at Cannes, where a photo with Richard Gere gained attention. She dazzled in a custom Nedo & Nedret Taciroglu Couture gown paired with a Rs 30 crore Serpenti necklace. Notable guests included Eiza González and Naomi Campbell. Upcoming projects include "Game Changer" and "Don 3" with Ranveer Singh.

Was Radhika Merchant's speech to Anant Ambani at pre-wedding inspired from 20-year-old Hollywood film 'Shall We Dance'?

etimes.in / Mar 08, 2024, 13:33 (IST)

Radhika Merchant delivered a romantic speech at her pre-wedding celebrations, expressing gratitude to her family and in-laws. However, netizens seemed to have found the inspiration behind the romantic speech. According to viral posts, the speech seems to have similarities with Susan Sarandon's monologue in the film 'Shall We Dance?'

Julia Roberts imagines the fate of ‘Pretty Woman’ characters Vivian and Edward, 33 years later

etimes.in / Dec 20, 2023, 12:17 (IST)

The discussion expanded to other notable roles, offering fans a captivating glimpse into Julia Roberts' creative musings about the lives of her on-screen personas. For Maggie and Ike from ‘Runaway Bride’, portrayed alongside Richard Gere once again, she envisioned a happily ever after, remarking, "They stay together. He doesn’t die in this one. They’re gonna stay together".

Julia Roberts was 'too scared' to read story of her new movie

IANS / Dec 02, 2023, 11:14 (IST)

Julia Roberts was too scared to read the 'Leave the World Behind' novel sent by director Sam Esmail. The film, produced by Barack Obama and Michelle through their company Higher Ground, is spooky and frightening. Roberts was very excited to have them on board. In the past, Roberts became a household name with 'Pretty Woman,' which was supposed to be a much darker film before Disney got involved.

Actress Julia Ormond sues Harvey Weinstein over alleged assault

AP / Oct 05, 2023, 19:33 (IST)

Julia Ormond, an actress whose career faded in the 1990s, has filed a lawsuit against Harvey Weinstein, accusing him of sexually assaulting her in 1995 and hindering her career afterwards. She also accuses The Walt Disney Co., Miramax, and her former agents of knowing about Weinstein's behavior but taking no action. Ormond claims that after confronting Weinstein, she received no support from her agents and was advised not to take legal action.

Cindy Crawford opens up about her ex-husband Richard Gere: He was older so I was just like in a different circle

etimes.in / Sep 21, 2023, 00:55 (IST)

Richard Gere was significantly older than Cindy Crawford, with a 17-year age gap. She met him when she was just 22. In docuseries The Super Models, Cindy opened up about her marriage with her ex-husband Richard.

'A woman groped can't be termed participative in act'

Agencies / Apr 12, 2023, 07:17 (IST)

A woman being groped on a street or public transport cannot be termed "participative" on her part in such incidents and she cannot be prosecuted for failing to act, a Mumbai court has held in the 2007 obscenity case over Richard Gere kissing Shilpa Shetty at a public event.

Richard Gere heaps praise on PM Modi; says, "He is a product of Indian culture"

ANI / Jun 21, 2023, 22:20 (IST)

Gere said, "It is a lovely message. He (PM Modi) is a product of Indian culture and comes from a vast place like Indian culture does. This message of universal brotherhood and sisterhood is the one we want to hear again and again."

PM Modi: Yoga — Indian origin but free to the world with no patent, copyright or royalty fees

TNN / Jun 21, 2023, 20:46 (IST)

"Yoga comes from India and it is a very old tradition. Yoga is free from copyrights, free from patents and free from royalty payments. Yoga is unifying; it is for everyone, for all ethnicities, for all faiths, for all cultures. Yoga is truly universal!" Modi said in remarks before participating in international yoga day under the aegis of UN.

Hollywood actor Richard Gere, spiritual leaders, industry captains join PM Modi for a star-studded yoga session at UN

PTI / Jun 21, 2023, 19:24 (IST)

Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi led a unique yoga session at the UN Headquarters in New York to celebrate the 9th International Day of Yoga. The event was attended by a host of eminent personalities, including Hollywood actor Richard Gere, chef Vikas Khanna, and British musician Jahnavi Harrison, among others.

Celebrities, spiritual leaders, politicians join PM Modi for star-studded yoga event in US

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jun 21, 2023, 19:06 (IST)

From Hollywood actors and singers to politicians and Yoga gurus, prominent personalities from different walks of life joined PM Modi on Wednesday as he led the mega Yoga Day celebrations outside the UN headquarters in New York.Among the people who attended the event were Hollywood actor Richard Gere, Iyengar yoga exponent Deidra Demens, New York City mayor Eric Adams, and prominent American singer Mary Millben.
